renderpass.code:
#define M iMouse
#define R iResolution
#define T iTime
#define pi 3.14

void mainImage(out vec4 fragColor,in vec2 fragCoord)
{vec2 m = ( iMouse.xy != vec2(0) ) ? M.xy/R.y*.5 : .5+.5*vec2(cos(T),sin(T)),
u=25.*m.y*(gl_FragCoord.rg-R.rg/2.)/R.r;
float d=pow(2.*length(u),1.2),
t=.005*(T*15.*m.x),
i=floor(d-atan(u.g,u.r)/pi/2.+.8),
a=atan(u.g,u.r)+pi*2.*i,
h=.2*a+2.2*t,
s=fract(a*.5/t)<.5?1.:0.,
v=fract(a*.5/t)<1.5?0.:0.;
fragColor=vec4(vec3(v+s*v*5.5)*vec3(s/v)+cos(pi*2.*(h+vec3(1.,.888,.666))),1.);}
